title: Chris Matthews: Trump's real power isn't what the GOP thinks
description: Chris Matthews, former host of Hardball and author of  “This Country: My life in Politics and History," joins Chuck to talk about whether former President Trump is a real or imagined power-center in the Republican Party.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Chris Matthews, former host of Hardball and author of  “This Country: My life in Politics and History," joins Chuck to talk about whether former President Trump is a real or imagined power-center in the Republican Party.
